You agree to the terms and conditions outlined in this Terms of Use Agreement (“Agreement”) with respect to our App (the “App”).
This Agreement constitutes the entire and only agreement between us and you, and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous agreements, representations, warranties and understandings with respect to the App, the content, products or services provided by or through the App, and the subject matter of this Agreement.
This Agreement may be amended at any time by us from time to time without specific notice to you. 
The latest Agreement will be posted on the App, and you should review this Agreement prior to using the App.

Terms and Conditions
 
This is an agreement between you and Japan App Studio, Inc. (hereinafter stated as “Provider” or “we”). Please read these Japan App Studio Terms of Use before using our application. In order to utilize our application and our cloud cooperate system, you need to agree to be bound by the terms of this agreement. 
 
1. Purpose 
This agreement applies to all services rendered including our free and paid application. 
 
2. Specification Change 
The Provider shall make specification changes stipulated in this agreement, such as services rendered and payments, without obtaining the customer’s consent in regards to the work involved in further specification changes. 
 
3. Service 
The service includes customer’s identifications, passwords, storage software for digital files, backup systems for former data, and all the services that accompany the Providers application. 
 
4. Delivery of Information 
The Provider will utilize customer e-mail addresses to notify customers of relevant information concerning their accounts. The Provider shall not be responsible for losses caused by failure to mail and unsent notifications. 
 
5. Application Procedure 
The customer shall apply to obtain the use of the Service by pressing the Agree button. Moreover, the customer agrees to the Provider’s protocol upon acceptance of the provisions of this Agreement. 
 
6. Payments 
Customer shall pay to the Provider through Apple, Inc. Payments Service. The Provider shall depend on Apple Inc. Payments Service for purchase verification and shall not issue their own receipts. 
 
7. Limitations of Liability 
The Provider and service subcontractor shall not be responsible for any direct, indirect, special, or consequential loss, in connection with the use of the service, disuse of the service, or systematic change of Apple, Inc. 
 
8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction 
All disputes, controversies, or differences which may arise between the providers hereto, out of or in relation to or in connection with this agreement shall be finally settled by arbitration in the exclusive jurisdiction of the first trial that the Providers designates (regardless of outside of Japan). 
 
9. Effective Date 
This Agreement shall take effect on 1st of April, 2013.
